attributes.action: Appoint a manager of the Goverment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Appoint a person of normal working business background not a politician to over see decsions that effect the people of this country.People like Sir Richard Branson, Sir Alan Sugar Bob Gedof etc. The Goverment shound be run like a business, the Goverment make Billions from the tax payers, and it gets wasted. New laws and polices should be reviewed to see who it effects etc like the £ per miles scheme.
